items.sentence: Tom makes way too many snide remarks. That\'s perhaps why he doesn\'t have very many friends.
I don\'t know when it\'ll be fixed, but I\'m sure either Tom or Mary will fix it fairly soon.
Tom became famous because he married a famous actress who had been married many times before.
Tom sets the table on Mondays, Wednesdays and Fridays. Mary sets the table on the other days.
Tom wondered what Mary would say if she knew he had spent the past week in Boston with Alice.
